item.excerpt:encoded: These durable vintage filament clear transparent c9 light strings have long lasting 3,000 hour bulbs and are on a 20 gauge SPT-1 black wire.

item.excerpt:encoded: Each string is full wave rectified, which eliminates any flickering making these LED Christmas lights brighter than ordinary LED mini Lights.

item.title: Mini Christmas Lights Clear
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Transform your holiday decor with the twinkling charm of our clear mini holiday light set. Crafted to bring a warm glow to any space, these lights add a touch of festive magic to trees, wreaths, or mantels.

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Thanks to the 2-in-1 function, the set easily turns into an artistic ball that will become the centerpiece of your holiday table.

item.title: Mug with a Christmas tree print
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b8dcaac7" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI4ZGNhYWM3Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123216908{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our exquisite collection of Christmas trees, crafted for both unparalleled beauty and effortless convenience. item.excerpt:encoded: Ideal for serving cookies, desserts, or even Santa's midnight snack, its festive design and durable ceramic finish will add a cozy touch to your cherished Christmas Eve traditions.

item.title: Premium Bowl for cookies and treats
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: This multi-compartment plate with a Santa figure will be the centrepiece of every Christmas dinner and coffee table.

item.title: Multi-colored Premium Porcelain Bowl
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Brighten up your table with this vibrant porcelain bowl, crafted from high-quality ceramic and finished in a festive mix of colors. Perfect for serving snacks, soups, or holiday treats with style and cheer.

item.title: 12-piece Tableware Set
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.excerpt:encoded: Bring timeless elegance to your holiday table with this 12-piece set, including plates, bowls, and mugs for four. Crafted from durable ceramic with a festive design, its perfect for seasonal gatherings and everyday cheer.

css=".vc_custom_1761057077466{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]What started as a small family tradition has grown into a joyful destination for festive enthusiasts everywhere. Our store is dedicated to bringing you the very best in Christmas decorations from timeless classics to unique finds that spark wonder.
Every ornament, garland, and twinkling light in our collection is handpicked to help you create unforgettable holiday memories. Whether youre decorating your first tree or continuing cherished traditions, were here to make your season brighter.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row item.excerpt:encoded: This radiant star ornament adds a bold, modern sparkle to your tree or windows with its unique sculptural design.

item.excerpt:encoded: Bring joy and humor to the holidays with this cozy jumper featuring a playful festive monkey perfect for kids or the young at heart.

item.title: Christmas Candleholder Star and Moon
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b8dcaac7" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI4ZGNhYWM3Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123216908{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our exquisite collection of Christmas trees, crafted for both unparalleled beauty and effortless convenience. We believe the magic of the holidays should be spent with loved ones, not wrestling with complicated tree assembly, which is why our trees feature an intuitive, user-friendly design.[/woodmart_text_block][woodmart_title align="left" size="small" woodmart_css_id="68f89b92cc68a" title="Effortless Setup for Instant Holiday Cheer:" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5MmNjNjhhIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGl0bGUiLCJkYXRhIjp7InRhYmxldCI6e30sIm1vYmlsZSI6e319fQ==" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123221624{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b98b7dc9" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5OGI3ZGM5Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123227022{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]Our innovative design boasts pre-attached, hinged branches that simply fall into place as you connect the tree sections. item.excerpt:encoded: This porcelain bauble features classic blue fluted detailing a refined and timeless addition to your holiday dcor.

item.excerpt:encoded: Tall and graceful, this matte-finish tealight holder brings Nordic minimalism and warm candlelight into your home.

item.title: Hedgehog porcelain Christmas decoration
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Sweet and tiny, this festive mouse ornament adds a playful, nostalgic note to your Christmas tree.

item.title: Wing Angels - Natural
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Add some sparkle to your Holidays with this light strand, featuring 50 Wide Angle Single Mold Coaxial Non-Rectified LED Lights on 22 Gauge Brown Wire, 6" Bulb Spacing.

item.title: Multicolor Smart Christmas Lights

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The string lights combines 100 bright, colorful, RGB LEDs, Bluetooth, and a state-of-the-art Twinkly smartphone application, to perform amazing animations easily and quickly.

item.title: Mini Christmas Light Set
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

We believe the magic of the holidays should be spent with loved ones, not wrestling with complicated tree assembly, which is why our trees feature an intuitive, user-friendly design.[/woodmart_text_block][woodmart_title align="left" size="small" woodmart_css_id="68f89b92cc68a" title="Effortless Setup for Instant Holiday Cheer:" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5MmNjNjhhIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGl0bGUiLCJkYXRhIjp7InRhYmxldCI6e30sIm1vYmlsZSI6e319fQ==" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123221624{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b98b7dc9" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5OGI3ZGM5Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123227022{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]Our innovative design boasts pre-attached, hinged branches that simply fall into place as you connect the tree sections. item.excerpt:encoded: A hot cocoa in the morning or a delicious eggnog under the Christmas tree tastes even better from this nostalgic mug. The mug is part of our exclusive special edition to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the Toy's Delight collection.

item.excerpt:encoded: The folk art inspired pattern features original work by painter that will enchant your home with the charm, spirit, and joie de vivre of country life!

Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The pure white collection goes beautifully with the Toy's Delight items in Christmas colours.

We believe the magic of the holidays should be spent with loved ones, not wrestling with complicated tree assembly, which is why our trees feature an intuitive, user-friendly design.[/woodmart_text_block][woodmart_title align="left" size="small" woodmart_css_id="68f89b92cc68a" title="Effortless Setup for Instant Holiday Cheer:" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5MmNjNjhhIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGl0bGUiLCJkYXRhIjp7InRhYmxldCI6e30sIm1vYmlsZSI6e319fQ==" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123221624{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b98b7dc9" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI5OGI3ZGM5Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123227022{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]Our innovative design boasts pre-attached, hinged branches that simply fall into place as you connect the tree sections. item.excerpt:encoded: You can hide delicious home-made biscuits or other treats in it and everything stays fresh for longer. Give your loved ones a treat.

item.excerpt:encoded: Introducing the Mixed Pine Promo Christmas Tree, a delightful addition to your festive dcor that seamlessly blends classic charm with robust design. This 7 ft tree is a picture-perfect symbol of the season that can be displayed in a variety of settings, whether indoors or in a sheltered outdoor area.

item.title: Norway Christmas Tree
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Introducing our enchanting Pre-Lit Norway Spruce Potted Christmas Tree, standing at a delightful 5 feet tall with a lush span of 81 cm to create a full-bodied, natural appearance that captivates and charms. Designed with a blend of 1217 mixed PE and PVC tips, this tree achieves an authentic spruce look that is both resilient and long-lasting.

item.title: Pre-Lit Cypress Fir Christmas Tree
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="68f89b8dcaac7" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2OGY4OWI4ZGNhYWM3Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no" css=".vc_custom_1761123216908{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our exquisite collection of Christmas trees, crafted for both unparalleled beauty and effortless convenience. item.excerpt:encoded: Elevate your festive celebrations with our Pre-Lit Slim Christmas Tree, a majestic beacon of warmth and cheer. Rising to a stately 6 ft, this slender silhouette is ideal for both spacious and tighter spaces, ensuring everyone can enjoy the magic of the season.

item.excerpt:encoded: Molded from natural Fraser fir branches, its elevated design mimics real foliage with 40 different tip variations, the most on any of our trees.

item.excerpt:encoded: Crafted with heavily flocked lifelike foliage, this artificial Christmas tree echoes the quiet charm of a snow-covered landscape. Decorate with traditional ornaments to create an enchanting backdrop for unforgettable holiday moments.

item.title: Artificial Christmas Tree
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The advantage is that many different molds are used and the branches each look unique. An artificial PE Christmas tree looks lifelike, especially if the branches are also sprayed in multiple colours! In addition, PE has a longer lifespan than the other materials PVC or PP. PE is extremely durable; it is very strong, abrasion resistant and UV resistant.

item.title: Christmas Tree - Ontario premium
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: The beautiful open structure ensures that you can decorate the tree well with many Christmas balls, hangers and other decoration.

item.excerpt:encoded: Bring a touch of elegance and festive magic into your home with the Snow Flocked Pre-Lit Mixed Pine Christmas Tree. Brimming with realism and luxurious detail, this beautiful tree is a true showstopper, ready to take centre stage in your seasonal display.

item.excerpt:encoded: With its sleek profile and sprightly outer tips, this slim artificial Christmas tree brings the natural beauty of the Great White North into your home.

item.title: Evergreen Snow Flocked Tip Christmas Tree
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Theres no more dreaming of a white Christmas with this Evergreen Snowy Tip Christmas Tree. The perfect addition to your festive display, this life-like Christmas tree is adorned with white snow flocked tips for an authentic, rustic look.

item.title: Alpine Balsam Fir Trees
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Our rustic Alpine Balsam Fir takes inspiration from beautiful mountain evergreens. This slim Christmas tree is sparse by design, allowing you to decorate with your favourite ornaments for a festive yet elegant display befitting the season.

item.excerpt:encoded: A piece as beautiful as this sapphire blue illuminated Christmas tree only comes along once in a blue moon. This midnight blue Christmas tree is the decoration you've been looking for and looks stunning when it's decorated.

item.excerpt:encoded: A charming tabletop tree straight out of a storybook, adorned with delicate details for a magical holiday touch.

crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Everyone loves reindeer for their magic and beauty. This beautifully crafted pre-lit reindeer will add the perfect dose of sparkle to your holiday.

item.title: Battery Operated LED Lights
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay

item.excerpt:encoded: Wide Angle LED Outdoor Set with 6Hr Automatic On-Off Timer and 6 Functions, 10" Lead and 5" Bulb Spacing, Uses 3AA Batteries not included. Battery life when timer is on is 25 days.
